page.title: 13All Saints Church,Sutton.
page.content: Sutton Church's tower has a Norman base which may be sited on an old Anglo Saxon Church. The Meering Chapel, probably 1525,is a fine example of Perpendicular work. The screen is very beautiful. The font cover is Jacobean. The present incumbent is Canon Hatter. He is responsible for 4 churches, and conducts services in each of them. 30 to 40 people attend church each Sunday and 20 children attend Sunday School. The church holds many social functions,eg. May Day Festival,All Saints Supper(Harvest Festival)and Christmas celebrations. Occasionally cultural events take place eg. Music Concerts,Flower Festivals and Drama.
